IsEmpty(string?)

Determines whether the specified string is empty, null, or consists only of white-space characters.

public static bool IsEmpty(this string? value)

Parameters

value string

The string to check.

Returns

bool

true if the string is empty, null, or consists only of white-space characters; otherwise, false.
